name: Sonic the Hedgehog in Wick Editor
name_original: Sonic the Hedgehog in Wick Editor
description:
Sonic the Hedgehog in Wick Editor is a game developed by Henry Stickmin BOIII. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play Sonic the Hedgehog in Wick Editor on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
